au.com.codeka.carrot.expr.binary

Class StrictIterationTermParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.codeka.carrot.expr.binary.StrictIterationTermParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TermParser

    public final class StrictIterationTermParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements TermParser
    A factory for iterable Terms.

    Note, this *always* returns a term which evaluates to an Iterable, even if no comma is present. This is different from using a LaxIterationTermParser which will return a single scalar if the term is not an iteration of values.
